link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt http://www.xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt-2005.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/instance http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-instance-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/XLink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xl-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xlink-2003-12-31.xsd

gen:link.msg:message: License number of auditor, Name of auditor signing report, Registration number of audit firm, Name of audit firm, Address 1, Postcode, Town, State MUST be reported
Nombor lesen juruaudit, Nama juruaudit yang menandatangani laporan, Nombor pendaftaran firma audit, Nama firma audit, Alamat 1, Poskod, Bandar, Negeri MESTI dilaporkan
License number of auditor, Name of auditor signing report, Registration number of audit firm, Name of audit firm, Address 1, Postcode, Town, State MUST be reported
Nombor lesen juruaudit, Nama juruaudit yang menandatangani laporan, Nombor pendaftaran firma audit, Nama firma audit, Alamat 1, Poskod, Bandar, Negeri MESTI dilaporkan
"Date of financial statements approved by Board of Directors" MUST be reported.
Tarikh penyata kewangan yang diluluskan oleh Lembaga Pengarah MESTI dilaporkan.
"Date of financial statements approved by Board of Directors" MUST be greater than "Company's current financial year end date"
Tarikh penyata kewangan yang diluluskan oleh Lembaga Pengarah MESTILAH lebih besar daripada "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan semasa syarikat"
"Date of circulation of financial statements and reports to members" MUST be reported.
Tarikh edaran penyata kewangan dan laporan kepada ahli MESTI dilaporkan.
"Date of circulation of financial statements and reports to members" must be equal to or greater than "Date of financial statements approved by Board of Directors"
Tarikh edaran penyata kewangan dan laporan kepada ahli mestilah sama atau lebih besar daripada "Tarikh penyata kewangan yang diluluskan oleh Lembaga Pengarah"
"Date of financial statements and reports of the directors and auditors (if applicable) laid in annual general meeting" must be reported if "Status of company" is "Public company"
Tarikh penyata kewangan dan laporan pengarah dan juruaudit (jika berkenaan) yang dibentangkan dalam mesyuarat agung tahunan hendaklah dilaporkan jika "Status syarikat" adalah "Public company"
"Date of Statutory Declaration" MUST be reported.
Tarikh Akuan Berkanun MESTI dilaporkan.
When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied to waive lodgement of financial statements by foreign company" as "Yes" THEN "Date of Statutory Declaration" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon untuk pengenepian serah simpan penyata kewangan oleh syarikat asing" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh Akuan Berkanun" MESTI dilaporkan.
"Date of Statutory Declaration" MUST be greater than "Company's financial year end date"
Tarikh Akuan Berkanun MESTILAH lebih besar daripada "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan semasa syarikat"
When filer selects from "Type of company" as "Unlimted companies" THEN "Disclosure of the regulation applied during incorporation of the company" should be "Companies Act 1965 or 2016"
Apabila pemfail memilih "Jenis syarikat" sebagai "Unlimited company" KEMUDIAN "Pendedahan berkenaan akta yang diguna pakai semasa pemerbadanan" hendaklah "Companies Act 1965 or 2016"

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for extension of time for holding annual general meeting" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pelanjutan masa untuk edaran dan mengadakan mesyuarat agung tahunan." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for extension of time to lodge annual return" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pelanjutan masa untuk menyerah simpan penyata tahunan." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports to Minister" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon apa-apa pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan kepada Menteri." MESTI dilaporkan.
Kindly ensure the company is eligible to be under Audit Exempted criteria
Sila pastikan syarikat layak berada di bawah Audit Exempted Criteria

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq 'Private company' and $V2 eq 'Unaudited' and $V4 eq 'First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation'

gen:link.msg:message: Kindly ensure the company is eligible to be under Audit Exempted criteria
Sila pastikan syarikat layak berada di bawah Audit Exempted Criteria

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq 'Private company' and $V2 eq 'Unaudited' and $V4 eq 'Subsequent preparation of financial statements'

gen:link.msg:message: Kindly ensure the company is eligible to be under Audit Exempted criteria
Sila pastikan syarikat layak berada di bawah Audit Exempted criteria

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq 'Public company' and $V2 eq 'Unaudited' and $V4 eq 'First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation'

gen:link.msg:message: Kindly ensure the company is eligible to be under Audit Exempted criteria
Sila pastikan syarikat layak berada di bawah Audit Exempted criteria

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq 'Public company' and $V2 eq 'Unaudited' and $V4 eq 'Subsequent preparation of financial statements'

gen:link.msg:message: "MSIC Code" MUST be reported
Kod MSIC MESTI dilaporkan.
"Description of business" MUST be reported
Perihalan Perniagaan MESTI dilaporkan - dijana secara automatik berdasarkan Kod MSIC
"Disclosure on whether comparative period values are restated" MUST be reported
Pendedahan sama ada terdapat nilai yang dinyatakan semula dalam tahun perbandingan MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure on whether reclassification of previous financial statements changed due to changes in accounting standards" MUST be reported
Pendedahan sama ada pengkelasan semula penyata kewangan terdahulu berubah disebabkan oleh perubahan dalam piawaian perakaunan MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure of Director's Report (text block)" MUST be reported.
Pendedahan Laporan Pengarah (blok teks) MESTI dilaporkan.
"Number of directors signing Director's report" MUST be reported.
Bilangan pengarah menandatangani laporan pengarah MESTI dilaporkan.
When filer selects "Status of company" as "Public company" THEN "Number of directors signing Director's report" should be equal to or more than "2"
Apabila pemfail memilih "Status syarikat" sebagai "Public company" KEMUDIAN "Bilangan pengarah menandatangani laporan pengarah" hendaklah sama dengan atau lebih daripada "2"
"Disclosure of contingent or other liability being enforceable within twelve months after the end of financial year" MUST be reported
Pendedahan kontigensi atau liabiliti lain yang boleh dikuatkuasakan dalam tempoh dua belas bulan selepas akhir tahun kewangan MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure of occurrence of any substantial, material or unusual in nature items, transactions or events" MUST be reported
Pendedahan perkara substansial, material atau kelainan dalam bentuk item, transaksi atau peristiwa MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure of directors received or become entitled to receive other benefits by reason of contract made by company or related corporation " MUST be reported
Pendedahan pengarah yang menerima atau layak menerima faedah lain atas sebab kontrak yang dibuat oleh syarikat atau perbadanan berkaitan MESTI dilaporkan
"Date of signing director's report" MUST be reported
Tarikh tandatangan laporan pengarah MESTI dilaporkan
"Date of signing director's report" must be greater than "Company's current financial year end date"
Tarikh tandatangan laporan pengarah mestilah lebih besar daripada "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan semasa syarikat"
When filer selects "Disclosure of financial statements audit status" as "Audited" THEN "Date of signing director's report" must be greater than or equal to "Date of signing auditor's report"

Apabila pemfail memilih "Pendedahan status audit penyata kewangan" sebagai "Audited KEMUDIAN "Tarikh tandatangan laporan pengarah" mestilah lebih besar daripada atau sama dengan "Tarikh laporan juruaudit ditandatangan"
"Disclosure of Statement by Directors (text block)" MUST be reported
Pendedahan Pernyataan oleh Pengarah (blok teks) MESTI dilaporkan

"Disclosure of directors opinion that the financial statements or consolidated financial statements are drawn up in accordance with approved accounting standards and reflect true and give true and fair view of financial position and performance of the company and the group" MUST be reported

Pendedahan pendapat pengarah bahawa penyata kewangan atau penyata kewangan disatukan adalah dibuat mengikut piawaian perakaunan yang diluluskan, untuk memberikan pandangan yang benar dan saksama mengenai kedudukan kewangan dan prestasi syarikat dan kumpulan MESTI dilaporkan
When filer selects "Status of company" as "Public company" then "Number of directors signing statement of directors" should be equal to or more than "2"
Apabila pemfail memilih "Status syarikat" sebagai "Public company" KEMUDIAN "Bilangan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh pengarah" hendaklah sama dengan atau lebih daripada "2"

"Name of first director who signed Director's report","Type of identification of first director who signed Director's report", "Identification number of the first director who signed director's report" MUST be reported.

"Nama pengarah pertama yang menandatangani laporan pengarah","Jenis pengenalan pengarah pertama yang menandatangani laporan pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan pengarah pertama yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" MESTI dilaporkan.

Number of directors signing Statement by Directors", "Name of first director who signed Statement by Directors", "Disclosure whether the first director is also primarily responsible for financial management of the company", "Type of identification of first director who signed Statement by Directors", "Identification number of the first director who signed Statement by Directors" MUST be reported

Bilangan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Nama pengarah pertama yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Pendedahan sama ada pengarah pertama juga bertanggungjawab terhadap pengurusan kewangan syarikat", "Jenis pengenalan pengarah pertama yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan pengarah pertama yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah" MESTI dilaporkan
"Date of signing statement by directors" must be greater than "Company's current financial year end date".
Tarikh Pernyataan oleh Pengarah ditandatangani mestilah lebih besar daripada "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan semasa syarikat".
When user selects “Disclosure of financial statements audit status” as “Audited” THEN "Type of auditor's opinion" MUST be reported
Apabila pengguna memilih "Pendedahan status audit penyata kewangan" sebagai "Audited" KEMUDIAN "Jenis pendapat juruaudit" MESTI dilaporkan
When user selects “Disclosure of financial statements audit status” as “Audited” THEN "Disclosure of auditor's report to members" MUST be reported
Apabila pengguna memilih "Pendedahan status audit penyata kewangan" sebagai "Audited" KEMUDIAN "Pendedahan laporan juruaudit kepada ahli" MESTI dilaporkan
When user selects “Disclosure of financial statements audit status” as “Audited” THEN "Date of signing auditor's report" MUST be reported
Apabila pengguna memilih "Pendedahan status audit penyata kewangan" sebagai "Audited" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh laporan juruaudit ditandatangan" MESTI dilaporkan
When filer selects "Disclosure of financial statements audit status" as "Audited" THEN "Date of signing auditor's report" must be greater than or equal to "Company's Current Financial year end"

Apabila pemfail memilih "Pendedahan status audit penyata kewangan" sebagai "Audited KEMUDIAN "Tarikh laporan juruaudit ditandatangan" mestilah lebih besar daripada atau sama dengan "Tarikh akhir tahun Kewangan Semasa Syarikat"
"Statement of financial position (text block)" MUST be reported
Penyata kedudukan kewangan (blok teks) MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure of notes and other explanatory information (text block)" MUST be reported
Pendedahan nota-nota dan lain-lain maklumat penjelasan (blok teks) MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure on categories of object of company limited by guarantee" is mandatory to be reported
Pendedahan mengenai kategori objek syarikat berhad menurut jaminan WAJIB dilaporkan

'When user selects from "Disclosure on categories of object of company limited by guarantee" as "Promoting any other objects useful for the community or country" THEN "Disclosure on sub-categories of object of promoting any other objects useful for the community or country" is mandatory to be reported

Apabila pengguna memilih daripada "Pendedahan mengenai kategori objek syarikat berhad menurut jaminan" sebagai "Promoting any other objects useful for the community or country" KEMUDIAN "Pendedahan mengenai subkategori objek mempromosikan objek lain yang berguna untuk komuniti atau negara" WAJIB dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq "Promoting any other objects useful for the community or country"

gen:link.msg:message: Disclosure of material accounting policy information (text block) MUST be reported
Pendedahan maklumat dasar perakaunan yang material (blok teks) MESTI dilaporkan
When filer selects "Others" as "Yes" THEN "Disclosure of other business review applied" is mandatory to be reported.
Apabila pemfail memilih "Lain-lain" sebagai "Ya" MAKA "Pendedahan ulasan perniagaan lain yang digunakan" wajib untuk dilaporkan.
Number of employees MUST be reported
Bilangan pekerja MESTI dilaporkan
Disclosure on whether opening statements changed due to changes in accounting standards MUST be reported.
Pendedahan sama ada penyata pembukaan berubah disebabkan oleh perubahan dalam piawaian perakaunan MESTI dilaporkan.
Description on whether company change the duration of financial reporting period MUST be reported.
Penerangan sama ada syarikat mengubah tempoh pelaporan kewangan MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects from "Disclosure on whether reclassification of previous financial statements changed due to changes in accounting standards" as "Yes" THEN "Disclosure of changes in accounting policies, accounting estimates and errors" MUST be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada "Pendedahan sama ada pengkelasan semula penyata kewangan terdahulu berubah disebabkan oleh perubahan dalam piawaian perakaunan" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Pendedahan perubahan dalam dasar perakaunan, anggaran dan kesilapan perakaunan" MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects from "Disclosure on whether opening statements changed due to changes in accounting standards" as "Yes" THEN "Disclosure of changes in accounting policies, accounting estimates and errors" MUST be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada "Pendedahan sama ada penyata pembukaan berubah disebabkan oleh perubahan dalam piawaian perakaunan" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Pendedahan perubahan dalam dasar perakaunan, anggaran dan kesilapan perakaunan" MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects "Disclosure on whether comparative period values are restated" as "Yes" THEN -"Disclosure of changes in accounting policies, accounting estimates and errors" MUST be reported -the previous reported values must be indicated as "Restatement"

Apabila pemfail memilih "Pendedahan sama ada terdapat nilai yang dinyatakan semula dalam tahun perbandingan" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN -"Pendedahan perubahan dalam dasar perakaunan, anggaran dan kesilapan perakaunan" MESTI dilaporkan -Nilai yang dilaporkan sebelumnya mesti dinyatakan sebagai "Penyataan Semula"
Date of financial statements and reports of the directors and auditors (if applicable) laid in annual general meeting must be greater than "Date of signing auditor's report"
Tarikh penyata kewangan dan laporan pengarah dan juruaudit (jika berkenaan) yang dibentangkan dalam mesyuarat agung tahunan mestilah lebih besar daripada "Tarikh laporan juruaudit ditandatangan"

If the "Number of directors signing Director's report" selected is 2 THEN "Name of director who signed Director's report", "Type of identification of director who signed director's report", "Identification number of the director who signed director's report" for first and second director is MANDATORY to be reported

Jika "Bilangan pengarah menandatangani laporan pengarah" yang dipilih ialah 2 KEMUDIAN "Nama pengarah yang menandatangani laporan pengarah", "Jenis pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" untuk pengarah pertama dan kedua WAJIB dilaporkan

If the "Number of directors signing Director's report" selected is 3 THEN "Name of director who signed Director's report", "Type of identification of director who signed director's report", "Identification number of the director who signed director's report" for first, second and third director is MANDATORY to be reported

Jika "Bilangan pengarah menandatangani laporan pengarah" yang dipilih ialah 3 KEMUDIAN "Nama pengarah yang menandatangani laporan pengarah", "Jenis pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" untuk pengarah pertama , kedua dan ketiga WAJIB dilaporkan

If the "Number of directors signing Director's report" selected is 4 THEN "Name of director who signed Director's report", "Type of identification of director who signed director's report", "Identification number of the director who signed director's report" for first , second, third and fourth director is MANDATORY to be reported

Jika "Bilangan pengarah yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" yang dipilih ialah 4 maka "Nama pengarah yang menandatangani laporan pengarah", "Jenis pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" untuk pengarah pertama, kedua, ketiga dan keempat WAJIB dilaporkan

If the "Number of directors signing Director's report" selected is 5 THEN "Name of director who signed Director's report", "Type of identification of director who signed director's report", "Identification number of the director who signed director's report" for first , second, third, fourth and fifth director is MANDATORY to be reported

Jika "Bilangan pengarah yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" yang dipilih ialah 5 KEMUDIAN "Nama pengarah yang menandatangani laporan pengarah", "Jenis pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" untuk pengarah pertama, kedua, ketiga, keempat dan kelima WAJIB dilaporkan

When filer selects "Number of directors signing Statement by Directors" as "2" THEN Name of director who signed Statement by Directors", "Disclosure whether the director is also primarily responsible for financial management of the company", "Type of identification of director who signed Statement by Directors", "Identification number of the director who signed Statement by Directors" for first and second director MUST be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih "Bilangan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah" sebagai "2" KEMUDIAN Nama pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Pendedahan sama ada pengarah juga bertanggungjawab terhadap pengurusan kewangan syarikat", "Jenis pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah"untuk pengarah pertama dan kedua MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects "Number of directors signing Statement by Directors" as "3" THEN Name of director who signed Statement by Directors", "Disclosure whether the director is also primarily responsible for financial management of the company", "Type of identification of director who signed Statement by Directors", "Identification number of the director who signed Statement by Directors" for first, second and third director MUST be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih "Bilangan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah" sebagai "3" KEMUDIAN Nama pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Pendedahan sama ada pengarah juga bertanggungjawab terhadap pengurusan kewangan syarikat", "Jenis pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah"untuk pengarah pertama, kedua dan ketiga MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects "Number of directors signing Statement by Directors" as "4" THEN Name of director who signed Statement by Directors", "Disclosure whether the director is also primarily responsible for financial management of the company", "Type of identification of director who signed Statement by Directors", "Identification number of the director who signed Statement by Directors" for first, second , third and fourth director MUST be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih "Bilangan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah" sebagai "4" KEMUDIAN Nama pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Pendedahan sama ada pengarah juga bertanggungjawab terhadap pengurusan kewangan syarikat", "Jenis pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah" untuk pengarah pertama, kedua , ketiga dan keempat MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects "Number of directors signing Statement by Directors" as "5" THEN Name of director who signed Statement by Directors", "Disclosure whether the director is also primarily responsible for financial management of the company", "Type of identification of director who signed Statement by Directors", "Identification number of the director who signed Statement by Directors" for first, second , third, fourth and fifth director MUST be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih "Bilangan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah" sebagai "5" KEMUDIAN Nama pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Pendedahan sama ada pengarah juga bertanggungjawab terhadap pengurusan kewangan syarikat", "Jenis pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah" untuk pengarah pertama, kedua, ketiga, keempat dan kelima MESTI dilaporkan

If all of the directors are"Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company" THEN "Name of other person primarily responsible for financial managements of the company", "Type of identification of other person primarily responsible for financial managements of the company" and "Identification number of other person primarily responsible for financial management of the company" MUST be reported

Jika semua pengarah "Tidak bertanggungjawab terhadap pengurusan kewangan syarikat" KEMUDIAN "Nama orang lain yang bertanggungjawab terhadap pengurusan kewangan syarikat", "Jenis pengenalan orang lain yang bertanggungjawab terhadap pengurusan kewangan syarikat" dan "Nombor pengenalan orang lain yang bertanggungjawab terhadap pengurusan kewangan syarikat" MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V2 eq "Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company") and ($V3 eq "Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company") and ($V4 eq "Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company") and ($V5 eq "Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company") and ($V6 eq "Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company")

variable:factVariable.fallbackValue: "Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company"
"Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company"
"Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company"
"Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company"
"Not primarily responsible for financial management of the company"

gen:link.msg:message: Date of signing statement by directors MUST be reported
Tarikh Pernyataan oleh Pengarah ditandatangani MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for exemption from coinciding foreign subsidiary financial year end with holding company" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pengecualian daripada keseragamaan tahun kewangan berakhir subidiari syarikat asing dengan syarikat induk." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied from filing financial statements and reports in full XBRL format" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pengecualian daripada pemfailan penuh penyata kewangan dan laporan mengikut format XBRL." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied to waive lodgement of financial statements by foreign company" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon untuk pengenepian serah simpan penyata kewangan oleh syarikat asing." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for relief from requirements as to form and contents of Director's report" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pengecualian berhubung kehendak dan keperluan butiran kandungan laporan pengarah." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for relief from requirements as to form and contents of financial statements" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pengecualian berhubung kehendak dan keperluan butiran kandungan penyata kewangan." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for extension of time for circulation of financial statements and reports" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon untuk pelanjutan masa bagi edaran penyata kewangan dan laporan." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for extension of time to lodge financial statements and reports" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pelanjutan masa untuk serah simpan penyata kewangan dan laporan" MESTI dilaporkan.

gen:link.msg:message: Total assets, "Accumulated Fund", "Contribution from members", "Reserves", "Non-controlling interest","Total fund/equity and reserve", "Total liabilities"and "Total fund/equity and liabilities" MUST be reported

gen:link.msg:message: "Total income", "Total expenditure", "Total surplus (deficit) before tax", "Total surplus (deficit) after tax" MUST be reported
"Jumlah pendapatan", "Jumlah perbelanjaan", "Jumlah lebihan (defisit) sebelum cukai", "Jumlah lebihan (defisit) selepas cukai" MESTI dilaporkan

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of first director who signed director's report" as MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the first director who signed Director's report"should be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada senarai "Jenis pengenalan pengarah pertama yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" sebagai MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS KEMUDIAN "Nombor pengenalan pengarah pertama yang menandatangani laporan pengarah", hendaklah nombor 12 digit
When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Identification number of the second director who signed director's report" as MyKad// MyPR/ MyKAS will be 12 digit number
Apabila pemfail memilih daripada senarai "Nombor pengenalan pengarah kedua yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" sebagai MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS hendaklah nombor 12 digit

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of third director who signed director's report" as MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the third director who signed Director's report"should be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada senarai "Jenis pengenalan pengarah ketiga yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" sebagai MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS KEMUDIAN "Nombor pengenalan pengarah ketiga yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" hendaklah nombor 12 digit

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of fourth director who signed director's report" as MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the fourth director who signed Director's report"should be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada senarai "Jenis pengenalan pengarah keempat yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" sebagai MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS KEMUDIAN "Nombor pengenalan pengarah keempat yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" hendaklah nombor 12 digit

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of fifth director who signed director's report" as MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the fifth director who signed Director's report"should be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada senarai "Jenis pengenalan pengarah kelima yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" sebagai MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS KEMUDIAN "Nombor pengenalan pengarah kelima yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" hendaklah nombor 12 digit

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of first director who signed Statement by Directors" as MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the first director who signed Statement by Directors" should be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada senarai "Jenis pengenalan pengarah pertama yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah" sebagai MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS KEMUDIAN "Nombor pengenalan pengarah pertama yang menandatangani Penyataan oleh Pengarah" hendaklah nombor 12 digit

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of third director who signed Statement by Directors" as MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the third director who signed Statement by Directors" will be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada senarai "Jenis pengenalan pengarah ketiga yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" sebagai MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS KEMUDIAN "Nombor pengenalan pengarah ketiga yang menandatangani laporan pengarah", akan jadi nombor 12 digit

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of fourth director who signed Statement by Directors" as MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the fourth director who signed Statement by Directors" will be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada senarai "Jenis pengenalan pengarah keempat yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" sebagai MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS KEMUDIAN "Nombor pengenalan pengarah keempat yang menandatangani laporan pengarah", akan jadi nombor 12 digit

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of fifth director who signed Statement by Directors" as MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the fifth director who signed Statement by Directors" will be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada senarai "Jenis pengenalan pengarah kelima yang menandatangani laporan pengarah" sebagai MyKad/MyPR/MyKAS KEMUDIAN "Nombor pengenalan pengarah kelima yang menandatangani laporan pengarah", akan jadi nombor 12 digit

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of second director who signed Statement by Directors" as MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the second director who signed Statement by Directors" will be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada senarai "Jenis pengenalan pengarah kedua yang menandatangani Pernyataan oleh Pengarah" sebagai MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS KEMUDIAN "Nombor pengenalan pengarah kedua yang menandatangani Penyata oleh Pengarah" ialah nombor 12 digit
When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Identification number of other person primarily responsible for financial management of the company'" as MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS will be 12 digit number
Apabila pemfail memilih dari senarai "Nombor pengenalan orang lain yang bertanggungjawab terhadap pengurusan kewangan syarikat'" sebagai MyKad / MyPR / MyKAS hendaklah nombor 12 digit
Statement of changes in fund (text block) MUST be reported
Penyata perubahan dana [blok teks] MESTI dilaporkan
Statement of cash flow (text block) MUST be reported
Penyata aliran tunai [blok teks] MESTI dilaporkan
"Total assets" must be equal to "Total fund/equity and liabilities"
"Jumlah aset" mesti sama dengan "Jumlah dana/ekuiti dan liabiliti"
Statement of income and expenditure (text block) MUST be reported
Penyata pendapatan dan perbelanjaan [blok teks] MESTI dilaporkan
